高效的习惯：只做最重要的事情，集中注意力，断网，限制邮件，环境整洁，吃饭，运动，睡觉有规律。

= 高效日常安排 =
# 每天早上设定MIT（最重要的事情）
# 坚决不做其他事情
# 集中注意力，不同时多任务
# 工作时切断互联网
# 保持办公桌整洁
# 饭前20分钟查收邮件，看社交网络
# 不留未读邮件，只订阅最重要的邮件
# 邮件尽量短小，5句话以内。
# 每天吃蔬菜水果
# 下班后先打扫房间
# 再做运动，每天至少5分钟
# 11点之前睡觉
# 养成习惯在于坚持


= Efficient and healty habits =
# MIT: do the most important thing, set it each morning
# Say "No": to non-MIT
# Focus: single-tasking: avoid multi-tasking
# Cut the internet when working
# Keep desktop tidy
# Checking email: only before lunch and dinner.
# Zero inbox: no burden
# keep email short (within 5 sentences) 
# Eat fruits and vegetables everyday
# Clean house: everyday after work
# Exercise: everyday, even just 5 min
# Go to bed before 11 pm
# Follow the routine

Reference: http://leoniedawson.com/free-poster-key-zen-habits/
